html:
1.16.18  8:15 pm   how can i become you

     i don't know, but if you do that then who is gonna be you

1.16.18  8:14 pm   What happened to the person at the end of La de da de da de da de day oh? Did they find a new home afterwards?

     the story ends before that point

1.16.18  8:10 pm   can you put the new song on spotify?

     it would be there already if i didn't spell it wrong the first time

1.16.18  8:07 pm   what percent of the bee movie can you recite

     the part about the aviation laws

1.16.18  8:03 pm   how do you make the decision between answering a question with or without a complete break from reality. or is ur reality just a more surreal one

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

1.16.18  8:00 pm   any deep Bill Wurtz Lore behind the "now hiring all positions" poster in ur room

     6.21.16  9:41 pm

1.16.18  7:55 pm   Are you interested in writing and releasing a music album? I think it could be great!

     i keep deciding that it's better to release 1 song at a time

1.16.18  7:40 pm   will La de da de da de da de day oh ever be available on itunes?

     yes. any minute now

1.16.18  7:36 pm   what do u do when everything feels pointless

     something that feels more pointiful

1.16.18  7:32 pm   am i reasonable?

     probably

1.16.18  7:30 pm   You ever tried to collaborate on any projects? (Like...let people help you with your videos, or you helping with other people's)

     a long time ago

1.16.18  7:30 pm   can you adopt me and be my dad

     i will do it when i get a chance

1.16.18  7:26 pm   why don't you make reality videos anymore? miss you. i mean them. the videos. 

     because i've been making other types of videos instead, which i couldn't make whilst i was doing the reality videos instead

1.16.18  7:21 pm   You're probably my favorite artist in any media, period. Any plans to do a projects outside of social media/YouTube?

     all my projects are done outside social media. they are also posted in a variety of places, including social media as well as other places outside social media

1.16.18  7:16 pm   Did/do you realise that people that need(ed) mental help came to you, seriously, and wanted some answer from you? 

     yes, that happens every day, and over the years i have tried to offer a range of different solutions, even though that is not necessarily my full time profession

1.16.18  7:13 pm   How do I get girls?

     try to focus on getting yourself

1.16.18  7:10 pm   Do you like your website?

     i tried to make it how i like

1.16.18  7:09 pm   Can you break the imagination barrier?

     i could try

1.16.18  7:07 pm   do you believe the universe is the way it is

     sure

1.16.18  7:07 pm   What did the ending of "La de da de da de da de day oh" mean/signify. If anything?

     the 3 other endings i tried before that just weren't worth it

1.16.18  6:59 pm   Can I be hired for a position?

     sure

1.16.18  6:52 pm   Do you have a home?

     i am getting one
1.16.18  6:41 pm   How much research do you do on the "history of japan"/"History of the entire world" videos?

1.16.18  6:38 pm   How can I change the world?

     start by figuring out how it currently is

1.16.18  6:33 pm   if i were to walk 1 mile forward then 1 mile back, have i walked 2 miles or zero miles

     2

1.16.18  6:22 pm   is it physically possible to answer questions any more vaguely ?

     than what

1.16.18  6:17 pm   why is your website like this

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

1.16.18  6:11 pm   Bill i have been playing guitar for like 2 years and have literally just been learning other peoples songs so that i could gain proficiency and know what im doing, i can read music and im really into folk and fingerstyle guitar but i dont know how to write at all. Every time i sit down i feel like i dont have the first idea on where to start. Do you just try something and say "Hey that sounds cool" or is it like a tune just comes to you? PLeAsE DonT IgNORe Me ThiS iS ImpORTanT

     don't forget to try putting in some words / language! etc

1.16.18  6:08 pm   where would you like to travel to?

     everywhere

     favorite place?

     everywhere

1.16.18  6:01 pm   How do i live with myself?

     so far you are doing great

1.16.18  6:00 pm   Any dating tips? 

     the best dates are when you didn't know it was a date until after

1.16.18  5:58 pm   What's the creative process like for you?

     maybe about like this

1.16.18  5:54 pm   Have you read the gospels about Jesus? (what do you think about them?)

     i have never read the originals. i think the earliest version in existence is like some kind of 300th anniversary compilation or something, which may have been spiced up a bit, for better sales

1.16.18  5:50 pm   How do I make good music

     just start making any music. the more music you make the more good it might get

1.16.18  5:48 pm   How can I learn to make music?

     just start doing it

1.16.18  5:45 pm   bill I am hardcore struggling in my music theory class with dictation and our test is coming soon, any tips? 

     go home and learn it on your own. trust me, it makes way more sense at home. then come back to class and ace it, impress your friends

1.16.18  5:45 pm   How do I find true love?

     start by finding your true self

1.16.18  5:40 pm   how do I become a better person?

     have you considered that you might already be too good

1.16.18  5:26 pm   How should I start a new story?

     try starting with something you think would never be a story

1.16.18  5:23 pm   Do you enjoy looking at turtles?

     yes, with moderation

1.16.18  5:19 pm   What is the meaning of the world?

     you

1.16.18  5:17 pm   Do you spend a greater portion of your time working on a project coming up with the [NON-DOG OCTET], or actually animating into a video? I'm asking this because "in california" came out only twenty days-ish after the release of history of the entire world, i guess, whereas your new video took almost three months after soap tips.

By the way new song is great

     i'm not sure what you mean. california was a song only, no video. non-dog octet was a video that came out in 2015 and was very short and took about a day to make. i actually don't understand your question

1.16.18  5:13 pm   Do you seriously compose all the music, play all the inrstuments, perform it and edit it all by yourself?

     only for my music and videos. i do not do it for other peoples' music and videos

1.16.18  5:12 pm   bill will i ever find love?

     yes

1.16.18  5:11 pm   you spelled questions wrong

     you ignored the color scheme

1.16.18  5:10 pm   Can you write a song about me please?

     who is this

1.16.18  5:09 pm   Is the answer to the universe 42?

     no

1.16.18  5:09 pm   what's your visual style?

     i guess you will have to get to know me and see

1.16.18  5:09 pm   how do one lives life?

     ok

1.16.18  5:04 pm   what should I ask for my birthday?

     to get older?
